summary: This mod offers 37 bark textures for the 67 tree meshes- Pines , aspens and logs-. Doen't cover yet the trees from the dlc.
descriptionHtml:
This mod offers 37 bark textures for the 67 tree meshes- Pines , aspens and logs-. Doen't cover yet the trees from the dlc.

( Pour les françois je vous renvoie sur la page de la Confrérie des Traducteurs qui ont la gentillesse de l'héberger depuis l'été 2017. En plus vous aurez un joli Fomod, réalisé avec talent par Oaristys :[url=https://confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/graphisme/environnement/50_nuances_decorce]50 Nuances d'écorce[/url]﻿ )

Regular installation, overwrite if asked. There is a patch for Simply Bigger Trees aplly it after and overwrite when prompted. There is also a tiny mod for mushrooms and flowers ( just a little color adjusment and retexturation ) that i really encourage you to install some of my  bark textures are ruined if not.

Enjoy.




[center]All flowers are beautiful
Let's have a walk
Run to the hills
Enter in a cave
And take some moss
Do some magic
Yellow potion
Take it
Aware you are
Knife in a pocket
Embrace the darkness
Not to much
Seven doors to open
Seven Knocks on each
Seven seats in each room with six trapped[/center]
author: Me
